name: Toronto streets photographic trip by a professional photojournalist
description: This triip is all about picturesque spots, you will have the opportunity to be photographed by an experienced published photojournalist. The most beautiful places of Toronto streets surrounded by an urban background,great architecture, special lights naturally provided around the cities corners and avenues, shadows and great urban scenario landscapes. Creativity is always my intention, and the places I propose are full of surprises. In addition, night photography is a specialty, and I love working at anytime of the day or night. Individuals, couples, groups.
